label.phrase: the basis of our activity should be simple ideals like truth honesty and trust among revolutionary brothers lying cheating mystification and-of necessity-violence should be employed only against the enemy whereas you my friend-and this is where you are most gravely mistaken-you have fallen under the spell of the systems of loyola and machiavelli you are enamored of police tactics and jesuitical methods and you are using such ideas to run your organization so you end up treating your own friends as though they were enemies
